content.query:
USE woca_ldw
GO

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/FamilyMembership/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO

--Explore the datatypes and column_ordinals
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''bronze/FamilyMembership/*.parquet'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''woca_data_src'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]'
GO



-- Chech the maximum length of some columns
/*
MAX(LEN(mag_familygroupmembershipid)),
MAX(LEN(mag_individual)),
MAX(LEN(mag_familygroup)),
MAX(LEN(mag_primarycontact)),
MAX(LEN(mag_familygrouprelationship)),
MAX(LEN(mag_familygrouprelationshiplabel))
*/
SELECT
    MAX(LEN(mag_familygrouprelationshiplabel)) AS MAX_LEN
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/FamilyMembership/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO

SELECT
    mag_familygroupmembershipid,
    mag_individual,
    mag_familygroup,
    mag_primarycontact,
    mag_familygrouprelationship,
    mag_familygrouprelationshiplabel
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/FamilyMembership/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO

-- Select specific columns
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/FamilyMembership/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        family_membership_id VARCHAR(50) 15,
        individual VARCHAR(50) 25,
        family VARCHAR(50) 10,
        primary_contact VARCHAR(10) 17,
        family_relationship VARCHAR(20) 4,
        family_relationship_label VARCHAR(20) 5
    ) AS [familyMember]
GO


-- Select specific columns where age_group_name is not null
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/FamilyMembership/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        family_membership_id VARCHAR(50) 15,
        individual VARCHAR(50) 25,
        family VARCHAR(50) 10,
        primary_contact VARCHAR(10) 17,
        family_relationship VARCHAR(20) 4,
        family_relationship_label VARCHAR(20) 5
    ) AS [familyMember]
WHERE family_id IS NOT NULL
GO


-- Count the number of records 8634
SELECT
    COUNT(1) AS TOTAL
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/FamilyMembership/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        family_membership_id VARCHAR(50) 15,
        individual VARCHAR(50) 25,
        family VARCHAR(50) 10,
        primary_contact VARCHAR(10) 17,
        family_relationship VARCHAR(20) 4,
        family_relationship_label VARCHAR(20) 5
    ) AS [familyMember]
GO


/*
===============USE THIS TO CREATE SILVER VIEW==========
*/

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/FamilyMembership/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        family_membership_id VARCHAR(50) 15,
        individual VARCHAR(50) 25,
        family VARCHAR(50) 10,
        primary_contact VARCHAR(10) 17,
        family_relationship VARCHAR(20) 4,
        family_relationship_label VARCHAR(20) 5
    ) AS [familyMember]
GO
